analysis.key_quote: To the extent that executive orders arguably contradict guidance and policy set forth by the Constitution and/or Congress, reclassifying program officials will leave them vulnerable to termination for reasons other than the merit of their performance or non-partisan execution of their duty.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of merit-based performance and the risks of politicization, indicating that reclassification could undermine the integrity of program officials' roles.
